physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Asymptomatic cholelithiasis detected by routine ultrasound at age 2 yr. Transient growth deceleration during the first 2 yr of treatment, followed by catch-up growth.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: A mild, transient growth deceleration observed during the first 2 yr of somatuline treatment, then catch-up growth occurred, and the patient resumed normal growth along the 50th percentile.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Inappropriately elevated insulin levels (up to 37.5 pmol/liter) and C-peptide (up to 0.58 ng/ml) during episodes of hypoglycemia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No change in growth pattern or cholelithiasis observed during treatment.
